analyzed: @30b phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /
translated: The Thus-Gone One is pure because the things that are beneficial are pure.

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: blo gros rnam par dag pa /

original: byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /
analyzed: byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: blo gros rnam par dag pa /

original: snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /
analyzed: snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: blo gros rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /
translated: the Thus-Gone One is pure because liberation is pure and the wisdom of liberation is pure.🔽Pure Intelligence,

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa; stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /
analyzed: blo gros rnam par dag pa; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /

original: blo gros rnam par dag pa /

original: de ltar de ebzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la /
analyzed: de ltar de ebzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la /

original: su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyi bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te /
analyzed: su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyi bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te /
translated: Whoever makes offerings to him with flowers, garlands, incense, parasols, banners, and so on, with music, and with ointments, will not be able to fathom the extent of the mass of his merit.🔽The extent of that merit cannot be exhausted

analyzed: shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: In the east, I pay homage to those who lead, the blessed buddhas who reside there with their retinues, and so forth.

analyzed: lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol /

analyzed: nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
